title.rendered: Why we closed our Angel round, early.

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.0.47″ next_background_color=”#000000″][et_pb_fullwidth_image _builder_version=”3.13.1″ src=”https://cyberianmine.de/wp-content/uploads/6.-Mining-News-V1-3.png” /][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ prev_background_color=”#000000″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.13.1″ module_alignment=”left” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_code _builder_version=”3.13.1″]"Reading 2 "minutes"[/et_pb_code][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia|900|||||||” header_font=”Source Sans Pro|700|||||||” header_font_size=”49px” max_width=”800px” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”left” header_text_align=”left” max_width_phone=”85%” text_font_size=”60px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_text_color=”#000000″ header_text_color=”#707070″ header_3_font=”Verdana|500|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#898989″ header_3_line_height=”1.4em”]

Why we closed our Angel round, early.

A glimpse into how the business is flowing for Cyberian Mine, and what are our plans for the future.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”21px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_line_height=”1.6em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” max_width=”800px” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”left” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” text_text_color=”#000000″]

Things are moving pretty fast for us here at Cyberian Mine.

When we launched our offering of preinstalled Antminer S9s to the public in May 2018, the interest from people wanting to mine with us was a little higher than even we had expected. To illustrate that, such demand let us drop our prices, at that time, from €1424 down to €1090 overnight! 

Fast-forward a year, one thing remains the same: we continue to improve our processes to bring the best solutions to our clients: you can reserve our currently available machines here, and check on our current preinstalled options here. 

We’re actually deep in our Seed Round right now, and will make some announcements soon.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Source Sans Pro|700|||||||” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_line_height=”1.4em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro|700|||||||” max_width=”800px” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”left” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”50px|||” text_font_size=”23px” header_2_font_size=”21px” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ text_text_color=”#000000″]

It’s not just about the money…

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”21px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_line_height=”1.6em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” max_width=”800px” module_alignment=”left” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_text_color=”#000000″]

Thanks to our early success, and the network of both our cofounders and Malcolm, our CMO, we found it pretty simple to raise the capital we felt we needed to move along in our roadmap.

We were able to be quite selective with our investors.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image _builder_version=”3.13.1″ src=”https://cyberianmine.de/wp-content/uploads/Picture-1-Cropped-1.jpg” alt=”Burgers (some veggie) and Beer at Room77, the Bitcoin Cafe in Berlin.” /][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” text_font_size=”14px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_line_height=”1.2em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” max_width=”800px” module_alignment=”left” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_text_color=”#898989″]

Burgers (some veggie) and Beer at Room77, the Bitcoin Cafe in Berlin.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”21px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_line_height=”1.6em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” max_width=”800px” module_alignment=”left” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_text_color=”#000000″]

 

We attracted a mix of cryptomining, governmental and startup experience to our board.

Personality, trustworthiness and willingness to support our small core team were other deciding factors in who we said yes to at this stage.

After spending a few days together in meetings, over food and in more “social” settings it felt like we had made very good choices for who we have brought into the mix.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Source Sans Pro|700|||||||” text_font_size=”23px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”23px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height=”1.4em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” max_width=”800px” module_alignment=”left” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”50px|||” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#000000″ text_text_color=”#000000″]

How early is early?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”21px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_line_height=”1.6em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” max_width=”800px” module_alignment=”left” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_text_color=”#000000″]

Pretty early.

We closed the round after we raised half the money we had initially sought.

This was due to a few factors. The most pressing was the success that we’ve had attracting customers to use our facilities in Siberia.

Whether it had been individual customers wanting to buy one to five machines at a time, or larger funds that were looking not only for the mining equipment and the cheap renewable electricity — but also looking to benefit from our experience with large numbers of machines, it had been a good few weeks of conversations, in-person meetings and sales.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image _builder_version=”3.13.1″ src=”https://cyberianmine.de/wp-content/uploads/Picture-2-Cropped.jpg” /][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” text_font_size=”14px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_line_height=”1.2em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” max_width=”800px” module_alignment=”left” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_text_color=”#898989″]

Expanding the Cap Table with the help of a Notar. Smiles all round.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Source Sans Pro|700|||||||” text_font_size=”23px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”23px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height=”1.4em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” max_width=”800px” module_alignment=”left” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”50px|||” text_text_color=”#000000″]

Why raise money at all?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”21px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_line_height=”1.6em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” max_width=”800px” module_alignment=”left” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_text_color=”#000000″]

There are three ways that people can benefit from our €0.03 kwh mining conditions.

All of which needed a physical infrastructure and a legal framework in place.

This takes time, and it takes money.

And the thing that takes the most money upfront, is filling our racks with preinstalled miners so that people can come to our site and start mining the same day.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image _builder_version=”3.13.1″ src=”https://cyberianmine.de/wp-content/uploads/Picture-3-Cropped.jpg” /][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” text_font_size=”14px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_line_height=”1.2em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” max_width=”800px” module_alignment=”left” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_text_color=”#898989″]

Lunch at The Factory, Berlin’s Startup Hub …and our home.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”21px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_line_height=”1.6em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” max_width=”800px” module_alignment=”left” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_text_color=”#000000″]

 

Our long term goals are to be part of a wider ecosystem that allows for end to end fulfillment of large and small cryptomining investment. But for now, our priority is to have inexpensive and buyer-ready machines for as many customers as possible.

The Angel Investment that came from Waldemar, Tore and Øystein allowed us to speed up our purchasing cycle even further — which means more Antminers were ready for the public.

The game continues.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”35px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_line_height=”1.6em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” max_width=”800px” module_alignment=”left” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_text_color=”#000000″]

. . .

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Blog Body” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_font=”Georgia||||||||” text_font_size=”21px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_line_height=”1.6em” header_2_font=”Source Sans Pro||||||||” max_width=”800px” module_alignment=”left” max_width_phone=”85%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_text_color=”#000000″]

 

The simplest way to get started mining is to purchase one our of preinstalled machines.

You sign our Hosting Agreement and purchase a unit from us. We point the miner to your crypto wallet, and you start earning from day one.

If you have any questions then please reach out to info@cyberianmine.de

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_post_nav _builder_version=”3.13.1″ prev_text=”Previous Article” next_text=”Next Article” in_same_term=”off” title_font=”Source Sans Pro|700|||||||” title_font_size=”20px” custom_padding=”50px|||” /][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
